document.full_text: the palestinian authority said monday it had not been able to pay salaries for the first time since 2007 because of israel's decision to halt the transfer of funds it collects on its behalf.
document.title: palestinian authority can't pay salaries in may
lines_and_colors: the palestinian authority said monday it had not been able to pay salaries for the first time since 2007 because of israel's decision to halt the transfer of funds it collects on its behalf.
